mapper.select: select count(*) as singular FROM exam_handover_sheet as ehs LEFT JOIN order_appointment as oa ON oa.order_no=ehs.order_no WHERE oa.related_no=#{nurseNo} and ehs.is_handovered=1
select sum(oai.amount) as totalMoney FROM order_appointment as oa LEFT JOIN order_additional_info as oai ON oa.order_no=oai.order_no WHERE oa.related_no=#{nurseNo} and oa.service_option=1
